text:
I have this code: My properties file looks like this: message.diskFull=Disk number {0} filled up at {1, time} on {1, date}. I get the following error message:

Validation error messages from tag library fmt-rt

null: <param> outside <message>

It looks to me like the tag is in the tag, but I've been wrong before. ;-)
creator: sabreware@earthlink.net
bayern@essentially.net
text:
No, you're right.  This time, however, it's just a duplicate bug.  :-)

Jan has fixed it temporarily by removing the validation logic.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7619 ***
